scripts.deploy: yarn build:contract && cd contract && near dev-deploy --wasmFile ./target/wasm32-unknown-unknown/release/nft_rental.wasm
scripts.deploy_testnet: yarn build:contract && cd contract && near deploy --wasmFile ./target/wasm32-unknown-unknown/release/nft_rental.wasm --accountId nft_rental.testnet
scripts.deploy_mainnet: yarn build:contract && cd contract && NEAR_ENV=mainnet near deploy --wasmFile ./target/wasm32-unknown-unknown/release/nft_rental.wasm --accountId nft_rental.near
scripts.deploy_demo_nft: yarn build:demo_nft && cd demo_nft_contract && near dev-deploy --wasmFile ./target/wasm32-unknown-unknown/release/tamagotchi.wasm
scripts.build:contract: cd contract && rustup target add wasm32-unknown-unknown && cargo build --all --target wasm32-unknown-unknown --release
scripts.build:demo_nft: cd demo_nft_contract && rustup target add wasm32-unknown-unknown && cargo build --all --target wasm32-unknown-unknown --release
scripts.test:integration: yarn build:contract && cd integration-tests && cargo run --example integration-tests "../contract/target/wasm32-unknown-unknown/release/nft_rental.wasm"
scripts.deps-install: yarn install && cd frontend && yarn install && cd ..
